data.lyric:
[ti:Holy Ground (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Holy Ground (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:02.05]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:04.10]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:06.16]I was reminiscing just the other day
[00:08.71]While having coffee all alone and Lord it took me away
[00:11.80]Back to a first-glance feeling on New York time
[00:14.89]Back when you fit my poems like a perfect rhyme
[00:18.41]Took off faster than a green light go
[00:21.03]Yeah you skip the conversation when you already know
[00:23.99]I left a note on the door with a joke we'd made
[00:27.53]And that was the first day
[00:29.53]
[00:30.40]And darling it was good
[00:34.85]
[00:36.76]Never looking down
[00:40.89]
[00:42.61]And right there where we stood
[00:46.89]
[00:48.36]Was holy ground
[00:50.39]
[01:01.41]Spinning like a girl in a brand new dress
[01:03.71]We had this big wide city all to ourselves
[01:06.79]We block the noise with the sound of "I need you"
[01:09.78]And for the first time I had something to lose
[01:13.33]And I guess we fell apart in the usual way
[01:16.06]And the story's got dust on every page
[01:19.18]But sometimes I wonder how you think about it now
[01:22.08]And I see your face in every crowd
[01:25.37]'Cause darling it was good
[01:30.07]
[01:31.67]Never looking down
[01:36.51]
[01:37.59]And right there where we stood
[01:42.16]
[01:43.12]Was holy ground
[01:46.43]
[01:56.54]Tonight I'm gonna dance
[01:59.67]For all that we've been through
[02:02.89]But I don't wanna dance
[02:05.78]If I'm not dancing with you
[02:08.85]Tonight I'm gonna dance
[02:11.79]Like you were in this room
[02:15.02]But I don't wanna dance
[02:17.92]If I'm not dancing with you
[02:21.88]
[02:22.43]It was good
[02:25.04]
[02:26.86]Never looking down
[02:31.39]
[02:32.60]And right there where we stood
[02:37.43]
[02:38.12]Was holy ground
[02:42.18]
[02:51.83]Tonight I'm gonna dance
[02:54.77]For all that we've been through
[02:57.92]But I don't wanna dance
[03:00.80]If I'm not dancing with you
[03:03.89]Tonight I'm gonna dance
[03:06.81]Like you were in this room
[03:10.06]But I don't wanna dance
[03:12.99]If I'm not dancing with you
data.trans:
[ti:Holy Ground (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.05]//
[00:04.10]//
[00:06.16]我记得有一天
[00:08.71]当我独自喝咖啡的时候 它把我带走
[00:11.80]回到第一眼看纽约时报的感觉
[00:14.89]回到当你像我的诗歌一样有完美的节奏
[00:18.41]走得就像通过绿灯一样快
[00:21.03]心灵相通 多余的话毋庸赘述
[00:23.99]门上字条 写着我们开过的玩笑
[00:27.53]相恋的第一天
[00:29.53]
[00:30.40]亲爱的 曾经多么美好
[00:34.85]
[00:36.76]不需要低头寻找
[00:40.89]
[00:42.61]双脚站立的地方
[00:46.89]
[00:48.36]就是我们的专属圣地 
[00:50.39]
[01:01.41]不停旋转 像小姑娘穿新衣一样欢喜
[01:03.71]摩登都市 灿烂灯火只为我们亮起
[01:06.79]我需要你的呼喊 将一切嘈杂屏蔽
[01:09.78]第一次有预感 你会离我而去
[01:13.33]我们的分手毫无新意
[01:16.06]我们的故事落满灰烬
[01:19.18]有时我也很好奇你会如何考虑
[01:22.08]你的面容如影随形 挥散不去 
[01:25.37]亲爱的 曾经多么美好
[01:30.07]
[01:31.67]不需要低头寻找
[01:36.51]
[01:37.59]双脚站立的地方
[01:42.16]
[01:43.12]就是我们的专属圣地 
[01:46.43]
[01:56.54]今夜 我愿为爱起舞
[01:59.67]为我们曾经历的一切
[02:02.89]若我的舞伴不是你
[02:05.78]我则不愿起舞
[02:08.85]今夜 我愿为爱起舞
[02:11.79]仿佛你就在此处
[02:15.02]若我的舞伴不是你
[02:17.92]我则不愿起舞
[02:21.88]
[02:22.43]曾经多么美好
[02:25.04]
[02:26.86]不需要低头寻找
[02:31.39]
[02:32.60]双脚站立的地方
[02:37.43]
[02:38.12]就是我们的专属圣地 
[02:42.18]
[02:51.83]今夜 我愿为爱起舞
[02:54.77]为我们曾经历的一切
[02:57.92]若我的舞伴不是你
[03:00.80]我则不愿起舞
[03:03.89]今夜 我愿为爱起舞
[03:06.81]仿佛你就在此处
[03:10.06]若我的舞伴不是你
[03:12.99]我则不愿起舞
